subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana, a two-time Cy Young award winner acquired last week from the Minnesota Twins, spoke with poise and confidence during a Mets welcoming event at Shea Stadium.
snippet: Johan Santana, a two-time Cy Young award winner acquired last week from the Minnesota Twins, spoke with poise and confidence during a Mets welcoming event at Shea Stadium.
